name: The World's Hardest Game 3D World
description:
Easy to play, very hard to finish. Can you beat The World's Hardest Game 3D World?

The World's Hardest Game, which you used to play on flash game sites, is now with you in 3D. But this time there are 5 different worlds! Good luck!

Challenge in different worlds, finish quests, upgrade your skills and reach the end in this 3D Hard Platformer.


  • 5 Worlds with different weathers
  • Dynamic quest system
  • Skill upgrades
  • Cute graphics and colorful atmosphere
  • Different soundtracks for every World
  • Unique maps for every World
  • Leveling system
  • Various challenging obstacles
  • Long playing time
  • New worlds will be added with updates
  • Auto save system



Dash to quickly dodge enemies!



Some Worlds have unique maps, look at them, finish quests, earn experience, collect stars and hearts, upgrade your skills and reach to the end!



You can upgrade your skills with stars!



You can keep track of the quests you have taken and completed by looking at the journal.
